text:
Currently, the default configuration file is broken if mod_ldap and
mod_authnz_ldap are built as DSOs.  mod_ldap is set to laoded before
mod_authnz_ldap, and the authnz module cannot resolve all of the required symbols.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
bnicholes@apache.org
text:
The exported functions of mod_ldap (util_ldap) have been reimplemented as 
optional functions.  This eliminates the ordering dependancy.

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text: *** Bug 34977 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
